pr_title: Update the nightly dev versions to conform to release policies documentation

timeline.bodyText: Just an FYI - These space removals are from me turning on the option to remove trailing space in VS Code. This is goodness.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -219,7 +222,7 @@ def prep_version_file_for_source_testing(build_type):
     with open(version_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
         for line in newlines:
             f.write(line)
-    
+

timeline.message: Update python to fix a small syntax error

timeline.bodyText: gah...this snuck in there because I'd accidentally submitted a mangled version_client.txt and reverting that also killed the last change to this file which was removal of this syntax error.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -182,7 +182,7 @@ def update_versions_file_for_nightly_devops(build_type, build_qualifier, artifac
                         # if the module is 1.2.3-beta.x, strip off everthing after the '-' and add the qualifier
                         module.dependency = module.dependency[:module.dependency.rfind('-') + 1] + unreleased_build_qualifier
                     else:
-                        module.dependency = module.dependency += '-' + unreleased_build_qualifier
+                        module.dependency += '-' + unreleased_build_qualifier
